about_the_game: Prepare yourself for the release of Gas Station Story with this unique Demo Build! Featuring a selection of encounters across the first few days of the story, this Demo follows the Clerk and Sam as they glitch their way across time at the mercy of the Update Virus.
detailed_description: Prepare yourself for the release of Gas Station Story with this unique Demo Build! Featuring a selection of encounters across the first few days of the story, this Demo follows the Clerk and Sam as they glitch their way across time at the mercy of the Update Virus.
name: Gas Station Story Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos

short_description: A surreal slice-of-life about a mysterious computer virus and its effects on the city you live in. Navigate life’s choices, fall in love with your coworker, and alienate your customers by being rude in this dystopian desert ring-‘em-up — featuring graphics created with a Game Boy Camera!
